scripts.encrypt: rm -f data/posts/* && TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"isolatedModules": false}' npx ts-node app/athena/_lib/encrypt.ts
scripts.deploy: MSG=$(git log -1 --pretty=%B); yarn encrypt && yarn build && git add -f out && git checkout gh-pages && for e in out/*; do if [ -d "$e" ]; then rm -r "${e:4}"; fi; done && mv out/* . && git add . && git commit -m "$MSG" && git push && git checkout main
